page.title: 16Recreation _ Leck area
page.content: {YOUTH CLUBS}There is a youth club in Cowan Bridge with a new youth club nearing completion which the young people of our area can attend. Whittington also has a youth club which meets in the Village Hall.Both these clubs are affiliated to the Lancashire youth clubs association. {CLUBS}There is the Lunesdale Farmers' Club which many local farmers attend once a month at Melling.The Leck and Cowan Bridge W.I.,which 26 local women attend, meets once a month.There is a bowling club in Kirkby Lonsdale where local people go to play.Because of the rural area in which we live anyone wishing to go swimming,play squash, have a sauna, play indoor ball games etc.has to go to the recreational centres in Kendal or Lancaster,both a- bout 15 miles away. Concerts, cinemas, restaurants etc. are available there.
